玤字的基本解释

玤
bàng
一种次于玉的石，可以做悬挂佩物的璧。
玉色的珠子。
古地名，在今中国河南省渑池县。

玤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bàng］
［《廣韻》步項切，上講，並。］
(1)次于玉的美石。
(2)古代地名。春秋虢地，今河南渑池县境。

玤字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　玤； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页728第08
【唐韻】補蠓切【集韻】【韻會】補孔切【正韻】邊孔切，?音琫。【說文】石之次玉者，以爲系璧。讀若蚌。【徐曰】系璧，飾玉系也。　又【廣韻】【正韻】步項切【集韻】【韻會】部項切，?音棒。義同。　又【廣韻】地名。【左傳·莊二十一年】虢公爲王宮于玤。【註】蚌，虢地。【釋文】玤，蒲項反。　【說文】本作?。【類篇】或作?。

玤
Basic explanation of words
玤
bàng
A kind of stone inferior to jade, which can be used as a wall for hanging objects.
Jade beads.
Ancient place names, in present-day Mianchi County, Henan Province, China.
玤
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bàng］
["Guangyun" step-by-step, last talk, and. ]
(1) Beautiful stone next to jade.
(2) Ancient place names. Spring and Autumn Guodi, now Mianchi County, Henan Province.
玤
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　玤; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 728 08
[Tang Yun] Filling midges and cutting [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Filling holes and cutting [Zhengyun] Side hole cutting,? Yin Ding. [Speaking of text] Those who are second to stone and jade, think that it is a bi. Read Ruo Clam. [Xu Yue] It is a bi, decorated with jade.　 [Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Step-by-step cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] Department-item cut, sound bar. The same meaning.　[Guangyun] place name. [Zuo Zhuan·21 Years of Zhuang] Guo Gong was the palace of Yuqi. 【Note】Clam, guodi. [Explanation] Ji, Pu Xiang counter.　【Said the text】This work?. 【Classes】Or for?.
